title: Frontend Developer
description:
We are looking for self-motivated, talented individuals to develop software, evolve our product and build resilient, reactive and scalable systems that provide an awesome user experience.
In terms of the global group, the successful candidate will be expected to first understand the current technology landscape, rapidly upskill in domain knowledge and then work with architecture to realise the evolution of our product.
This role will require a person with strong technical skills and proven experience in working in a dynamic, high performance technical team.
Join us in our journey to build a new vision of our future!

title: Decision Analytics Data Management
Information Security Engineer
description:
The Ideal Candidate:
- BS degree in computing, information security, or a related field. MS is preferred.
- 10+ years of information security experience is also acceptable in lieu of a degree.
- Industry certifications preferred – for example CISSP, CISA, CEH, OSCP, Security+
- Strong experience with Microsoft Windows, MacOS and Linux operating systems.
- Strong experience with AWS security & configuration best practices and tools.
- Strong experience in network security including next gen firewalls, IDS/IPS, VPN and WAF.
- Strong experience using vulnerability management tools, for example Tenable, Qualys, Veracode.
- Experience deploying security controls in a SOC2 environment.
- Experience working with SIEM tools, for example LogRhythm, QRadar, Splunk.
- Experience with script-based automation, including Kubernetes, Ansible, Python.
- Experience with incident response, forensics and evidence preservation.
- Experience working in a global, multi-time zone business.
- Strong communications skills – an ability to communicate technical security requirements to business units, set strategy, and implement security initiatives.

title: IT Support Technician
description:
The Ideal Candidate:
- New to the tech industry? Look no further, we are recruiting a Junior IT Support Specialist to join us in our Targu-Mures office.
-  If you like to help people and wish to work in growing tech company, then this is your stop. 
- We will make sure that you fit right in and offer our time and effort to teach you the trade.

title: Backend Developer
description:
The projects we develop require:
- Minimum of 3 years experience in C#/.NET Core 3.1 and above. 
- Good knowledge in REST APIs, Entity Framework, Microsoft SQL Server Management, .NET Core Identity. 
- Good understanding of OOP principles & patterns.
- Experience with version control using Git. Be able to review design proposals and pull requests.
- Experience in working in agile environments. Proactive in helping the team on the .NET stack.

Good to have:
- Basic knowledge of Microsoft Azure, CI/CD pipelines. 
- Basic knowledge of Angular (or similar UI framework).
- Unit Testing / Automation experience.
